attributes.action: Make it law to report it to the police you hit a cat when driving
attributes.additional_details: I would like it to be law because it’s not fair that when dogs get run over you have to report it but when it’s a cat you don’t and it’s devastating when cat owners don’t get sympathy from the law when a cat is run over
attributes.background: When people are driving and hit a cat they should report it to the police like you do when you run over a dog

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Require drivers to stop and take cats to the vets if they hit them in their car https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728011
